name: Doygunluk Meyvesi
desc: Aranara hikayesinden elde ettiğin bir meyve. Her sorunu çözebilecek bir potansiyele sahip.

desc.text:
"Ay, aslında her zaman bir inci gibi görünmüyordu..."
Bu çok çok uzun zaman önceye ait korkunç bir hikaye. Neyse ki sadece bir hikaye, kimsenin anısı değil.
Bir zamanlar ay, vahşice sırıtan dişlere dönüştü. Ay ışığı artık çimenlerin üzerine düşüp çiyi parıldayan incilere dönüştürmek için yaprakların arasından süzülmüyordu.
Ağaçlar, kuvvetli rüzgarların ezdiği buğday dalları gibi yere yığıldı. Toprağın her zerresini keder kaplamıştı.
Keder o denli büyük ve şiddetliydi ki akarsular bile keskin tuz ve demir kokusuyla doluydu.
Yaratıcımız Kraliçe Aranyani, orman konusunda bize güvendi. Biz de karanlıktan gelen canavarlara, demir ve çelikten yapılmış devlere ve Maranaya karşı savaşa giriştik.
Ormanın çocuklarıyla birlikte çöle girdi. Felaketin köklerini yaktılar ve dallarını kırdılar ancak sadece birkaçı sonunda ağaçların gölgesine geri dönebildi.
Vanarana'yı kaybettik ve çok fazla Aranara zamanından önce toprağa döndü. Hayatta kalanların hikayesi bile acı ve ızdırap vericiydi.
Ama sonunda felaketin üstesinden geldik. En derin kum denizinde bile nilüferler hâlâ çiçek açmaya devam ediyordu.
Bizi yaratan toprağın içi, yurdun boş kalbini onarmak için bir kez daha yeni bir hayat yaratmıştı.
...
Cesaret ve güç, en acı hikayelerde bile hâlâ yankılanıyor. Hiçbir hikaye "hatıralar" kadar güçlü değildir ancak yine de güç verir.
Bana anlattığın hikayeleri, maceramızın hikayelerini hiç unutmayacağım. Felaket tekrar ederse ve ay değişime uğrarsa, bu hikayeler ormanı sizin adınıza koruyacak.

materials.name: Vaha Bahçesi Hatırası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

People used to say that the Lord of Flowers was the Lord of Joy and Happiness. Freshwater sprang from her sleeves, and thus was the oasis of blossoming flowers born in the desert. Flowers and grasses followed in her footsteps, and gleaming moonlight cleared the way for her.

In the bitter days when the sky turned its back on the ground, the Lord of Flowers extended her mercy to each and every one of the mortals, letting them regain their happiness and egos, allowing leisure and luxury to resume.

materials.name: Kasvetli Heykelcik
materials.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown person.
Even though this carving has seen many years pass, it still has not been damaged in any way. It seems that its previous owner must have cherished it like some holy icon.

materials.name: Mantar Sporları
materials.desc: A small amount of glittering spore powder left behind by Floating Fungi. Seems that a sneeze is all it takes for this powder to vanish without a trace.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Vaha Bahçesi Zarafeti
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

In the literature buried deep beneath the yellow sands, the Lord of Flowers was the Mistress of Dreams.

She bestowed dreams upon the exiled, the manic, and the foolish.

In those dreams, they were presented with their dearest delights. Burdened by the brutality of reality, they were fascinated by the charm of the Lord of Flowers and captivated by her beauty and care.

materials.name: Kasvetli Heykelcik
materials.desc:

Even though this carving has seen many years pass, it still has not been damaged in any way. It seems that its previous owner must have cherished it like some holy icon.

materials.name: Vaha Bahçesi Zarafeti
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

In the literature buried deep beneath the yellow sands, the Lord of Flowers was the Mistress of Dreams.

She bestowed dreams upon the exiled, the manic, and the foolish.

In those dreams, they were presented with their dearest delights. Burdened by the brutality of reality, they were fascinated by the charm of the Lord of Flowers and captivated by her beauty and care.

materials.name: Kara Heykelcik
materials.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown, one-eyed person.
You can feel a strange warmth emanating from within as you hold onto it, like the shoulder of a dear friend. Perhaps this icon can indeed give people who understand its significance the courage to carry on.

materials.name: Parlak Polen
materials.desc: A small parcel of luminescent Fungal Spore powder, a common medical ingredient in the land of rainforests. Merchants usually sell them in paper packets.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Vaha Bahçesi Matemi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

The Lord of Flowers was in an amicable relationship with the Jinn.

The Mistress of Flowers and Oases joined hands with the Lord of Deserts and built Ay-Khanoum, the "City of Amphitheaters," which carried the meaning of "City of the Moon Maiden" in the ancient language on the Jinn.

Later, however, it was said that the Lord of Flowers died due to the malice of the burning sun and yellow sand, after which the blossoms of purple Padisarahs were never seen again in the oases. After the departure of the Lord of Flowers, the sandstorms keened, the Jinn sobbed, and the moonlight-silver gem disc lost its original, glad purpose, giving off a mournful glimmer.

materials.name: Kara Heykelcik
materials.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown, one-eyed person.
You can feel a strange warmth emanating from within as you hold onto it, like the shoulder of a dear friend. Perhaps this icon can indeed give people who understand its significance the courage to carry on.

materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

The Mistress of Flowers and Oases joined hands with the Lord of Deserts and built Ay-Khanoum, the "City of Amphitheaters," which carried the meaning of "City of the Moon Maiden" in the ancient language on the Jinn.

After the departure of the Lord of Flowers, the sandstorms keened, the Jinn sobbed, and the moonlight-silver gem disc lost its original, glad purpose, giving off a mournful glimmer.

materials.name: Ölümcül Heykelcik
materials.desc:
A one-eyed carving that emanates an ominous energy, with no indication of what it's made of.
As you gaze upon this idol, you can almost hear a strange, comforting whisper...
"See, my child. All that lies under the throne of heaven shall be destroyed by upheaval. The eternal peace of the pitch-dark void shall embrace us all."

materials.name: Kristal Toz Kutusu
materials.desc: A huge lump of spore powder collected from a structurally complete spore cyst. Put it in an appropriate environment, and the area might be filled with a thriving aggregation of Floating Fungi later...

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Vaha Bahçesi Gerçeği
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

"Who would worship a departed god?"

The Lord of Flowers was once in alliance with two other gods. Apart from wisdom and power, she also brought mercy and joy to her people.

Just as the earth needs more than the burning sunshine and pouring rain, to the people of the Lord of Flowers, joy and love, singing and music, and wine and extravagance were just as vital as strength and sensibility.

It is said that flowers blossom so that they may enjoy a spectacular death, and that death was precisely the wholehearted pursuit of the Lord of Flowers - for death adds bitterness to lost joy, and intensifies with time across endless memories.

The ignorant Lord of Deserts was never aware of her reasoning. He only reveled in her immense charm and grace - and as misguided as such fervent affections might be, they were well within the calculations of the Lord of Flowers.

materials.name: Ölümcül Heykelcik
materials.desc:

As you gaze upon this idol, you can almost hear a strange, comforting whisper...

customize.name: Orta Diyar Katalizör Prototipi
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.

Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

customize.name: Su Kristal Parçası
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Beyaz Demir Parçası
customize.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

customize.name: Doygunluk Meyvesi
customize.desc: Aranara hikayesinden elde ettiğin bir meyve. Her sorunu çözebilecek bir potansiyele sahip.

customize.text: Bir Element Tepkimesi tetiklendikten sonra Element Ustalığını <color=#37ffff>27</color> artıran ama Saldırıyı %5 azaltan "İnişli Çıkışlı" etkisi elde edilir. Her 0,3 saniyede 1 İnişli Çıkışlı kademesi kazanılabilir. En fazla 5 kademeye kadar birikir. Element Tepkimesi tetiklenmeyen her 6 saniyede 1 kademe kaybedilir. Bu etki, karakter savaş alanında olmasa da tetiklenebilir.

customize.name: Orman Nişanı
customize.desc: Aranara hikayesinden elde ettiğin bir silah. Ormanın düşmanlarını ikiye ayırabileceğin bir büyük kılıcın şekline girmiş.

customize.name: Kralın Yaveri
customize.desc: Aranara hikayesinden elde ettiğin bir silah. Ormanın düşmanlarını vurabileceğin bir yay şekline girmiş.

customize.name: Mehtap Delen
customize.desc: Bir Aranara hikayesinden elde ettiğin silah. Mızrak olarak kullanabilecek derecede devasa bir ok şeklinde.

customize.name: İç Kabuk Kılıcı
customize.desc: Aranara hikayesinden elde ettiğin bir silah. Ormanın düşmanlarını ikiye ayırabileceğin bir kılıcın şekline girmiş.

value.name: Kehanet Hikayesi
value.desc:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the catalyst "Fruit of Fulfillment."

This tale is about portents and disasters.

"In truth, the moon did not always look like a pearl..."

baseInfo.key: Dehanın Yakarışı Kart Oyunu Silah Kartı

value.name: Doygunluk Meyvesi
value.desc:
Dolunay: Doygunluk Meyvesi

"En acı hikayeler bile cesaret ve güç barındırır...

İyi kalpli Altın Naranın bizimle yaşadığı maceralarının hikayesi,

ormanı savunmasına yardım edecek."
